title: Slattery Auctions Harvester
description: Harvests vehicle listings from slatteryauctions.com.au. Two modes: stub (discovery pages) and detail (individual assets). Requires Playwright for JavaScript rendering.

mode.title: Harvester Mode
mode.description: stub = crawl category/auction pages and extract asset URLs; detail = fetch individual asset pages and extract vehicle data

maxPages.title: Max Pages (stub mode)
maxPages.description: Maximum number of category/auction pages to crawl in stub mode

detailUrls.title: Detail URLs (detail mode)
detailUrls.description: Array of objects with source_stock_id and detail_url to process in detail mode. Can also read from pickles_detail_queue.

ingestKey.title: Ingest API Key (VMA_INGEST_KEY)
ingestKey.description: VMA_INGEST_KEY for authenticating with Edge functions (same key used by VMA/Pickles/Manheim/Grays harvesters)

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of items to send per POST request

dryRun.title: Dry Run
dryRun.description: If true, extract data but don't POST to Edge functions
